content:
When I validate http://build.fhir.org/condition-example-f204-renal.xml.html (or the json variant)
taken from the FHIR examples (without id), and validate, HAPI claims:
"Error: HTTP 412 Precondition Failed: Code 55607006 is not a valid code in code system http://snomed.info/sct"
According to Snomed it is:
https://browser.ihtsdotools.org/?perspective=full&conceptId1=55607006&edition=en-edition&release=v20190131&server=https://prod-browser-exten.ihtsdotools.org/api/snomed&langRefset=900000000000509007

Using one of the Observation examples:
http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/observation-example.xml.html
and validating (without id) I get a HAPI response:
Error: HTTP 412 Precondition Failed: The Coding references a value set, not a code system ("http://loinc.org")
Either I'm doing something wrong which I don't get (just validating regular FHIR examples) or something is broken on HAPI's handling of codesystems.
how did you set up the terminology sub-system?
